queries.name: character
queries.description: Get a specific character by ID

queries.name: characters
queries.description: Get the list of all characters

queries.name: charactersByIds
queries.description: Get a list of characters selected by ids

queries.name: location
queries.description: Get a specific locations by ID

queries.name: locations
queries.description: Get the list of all locations

queries.name: locationsByIds
queries.description: Get a list of locations selected by ids

queries.name: episode
queries.description: Get a specific episode by ID

queries.name: episodes
queries.description: Get the list of all episodes

queries.name: episodesByIds
queries.description: Get a list of episodes selected by ids

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of the character.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the character.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the character ('Alive', 'Dead' or 'unknown').

fields.name: species
fields.description: The species of the character.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type or subspecies of the character.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: The gender of the character ('Female', 'Male', 'Genderless' or 'unknown').

fields.name: origin
fields.description: The character's origin location

fields.name: location
fields.description: The character's last known location

fields.name: image
fields.description:
Link to the character's image.
All images are 300x300px and most are medium shots or portraits since they are intended to be used as avatars.

fields.name: episode
fields.description: Episodes in which this character appeared.

fields.name: created
fields.description: Time at which the character was created in the database.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of the location.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the location.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the location.

fields.name: dimension
fields.description: The dimension in which the location is located.

fields.name: residents
fields.description: List of characters who have been last seen in the location.

fields.name: created
fields.description: Time at which the location was created in the database.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of the episode.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the episode.

fields.name: air_date
fields.description: The air date of the episode.

fields.name: episode
fields.description: The code of the episode.

fields.name: characters
fields.description: List of characters who have been seen in the episode.

fields.name: created
fields.description: Time at which the episode was created in the database.
